mp3guy/ElasticFusion

ElasticFusion lets you build real-time 3D maps of indoor spaces using an RGB-D camera, perfect for capturing detailed room layouts as you move around

View on index

Related repos

  • Visualizes and explores 3D models in a browser
  • diffusion models for generating images, audio, and 3D with easy pipelines
  • Real-time 3D map of Tokyo’s public transport
  • PyTorch tool for 3D human animation, reconstruction, and motion processing
